home.findings: Significant layout shift risks detected in dynamic components (PatientEducationVideos, RecoveryTimeline, LocalReputationPanel). Placeholder heights did not match calculated content heights.
home.action: Adjusted placeholder heights in app/page.tsx to match estimated content dimensions (PatientEducationVideos: 600px/1700px, RecoveryTimeline: 1400px/1500px, LocalReputationPanel: 600px/1100px).
home.verification: Manual calculation of content heights matches new placeholder values. Build passed. Visual verification (verification/home_page.png) confirms placeholders function correctly.

location.notes: Map embed uses facade pattern (click-to-load), preventing LCP/INP issues.

appointment.findings: Appointment page used a full-page client component (NeuraLinkBookingApp) which delayed LCP element (Hero H1) painting until hydration.
appointment.action: Refactored NeuraLinkBookingApp to accept server-rendered hero content. Extracted H1 and static text to BookingHeroContent (Server Component) and passed as children.
appointment.verification: Build passed. Static analysis confirms H1 is now in the server output of app/appointments/page.tsx.
